TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TResult Func<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,in T5,in T6,in T7,in T8,out TResult>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8);
.class public auto ansi sealed Func`9<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7, - T8, + TResult> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function Func(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7, In T8, Out TResult)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7, arg8 As T8) As TResult

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename TResult> public delegate TResult Func(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8);

span.span: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數類型。

typeparam.span: 這個委派所封裝方法之第 8 個參數的型別。

span.span: The type of the eighth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的傳回值之類型。

span.span: The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數。

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數。

span.span: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封裝具有八個參數的方法，並傳回由 參數指定之型別的值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has eight parameters and returns a value of the type specified by the parameter.

returns.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的傳回值。

span.span: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此委派来表示的方法，可以當做參數傳遞，而不必明確宣告自訂委派。You can use this delegate to represent a method that can be passed as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應至這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有 8 個參數，其中每一個都依值傳遞給它，而且它必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have eight parameters, each of which is passed to it by value, and that it must return a value. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考的方法具有 8 個參數並傳回`void`(或在 Visual Basic 中宣告為`Sub`而`Function`)，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has eight parameters and returns `void` (or in Visual Basic, that is declared as a `Sub` rather than as a `Function`), use the generic delegate instead. 您也可以使用委派匿名方法與 lambda 運算式。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions. Lambda 運算式的基礎類型是泛型的其中一個`Func`委派。The underlying type of a lambda expression is one of the generic `Func` delegates. 這可讓您能夠將 lambda 運算式當做參數傳遞而不明確地將它指派給委派。This makes it possible to pass a lambda expression as a parameter without explicitly assigning it to a delegate.
